body.p:
To His Excellency Thos E Bramlette
Govener of the State of Kentucky

Your Petitioners whose names are hereunto anexed would Respectively state to you the following facts (to wit) that on the day of 1863 one Jno B Cassaday Grossly insulted Ben F Hiser by Calling him a Damned Liar & that the said Hiser did Draw a Pistol on the said Cassady for which offence he was indited by the Grand Jury of Metcalfe County & a True Bill found against the said Hiser for said office & that afterwords (to wit) the Term of said Court said Hiser in his absent was true for said office. and a Judgment Rendered against him for fifty dollars & the costs of said prosecution Now we state sthat said fine was an exorbitant one & we ask you to exercise the power vested in you, & that you Remit said fine, from the fact that said Hiser cannot without seriously injuring himself & familiy pay said fine

J, H, C, Sundidge
Ben R Clark
J A Rousseau
J H Read
R H Young

Metcalfe Cir Ct
vs
Ben F. Hiser
$50,
Concealed Weapons
Remitted 19 Dec 1865
